sentences.english: Since this would be your first date, at least have good reasons why you want to meet or see someone.
sentences.chinese: 当你读瑞茜威瑟彭斯的故事时，想想她遇到的挫折。

sentences.english: He pointed out that Burn's poems are fresh in all times.
sentences.chinese: 他指出彭斯的诗在一切时代都具有新鲜感。

sentences.english: Many elements contribute to the beauty of Peng Si's portraits.
sentences.chinese: 诸多因素促成了彭斯的肖像之美。

sentences.english: "It's a very charismatic speech, " Burns told WTOV.
sentences.chinese: “这是一个很有个人魅力的演讲”彭斯告诉WTOV。

sentences.english: Mrs Burns doesn't seem to have benefited from the treatment.
sentences.chinese: 这种疗法对彭斯夫人似乎并不奏效。

sentences.english: He pointed out that Burns poems are fresh in all times.
sentences.chinese: 他指出彭斯的诗在任何时代都具有新鲜感。
